text: Uplands is an under construction station on the Airport Link of the Trillium Line in Ottawa, Ontario. It is being constructed as part of the Stage 2 O-Train expansion and is scheduled for completion in 2022. The station will consist of two side platforms and is part of the only double tracked segment of the Airport Link. ==References== Category:Trillium Line stations Category:Railway stations scheduled to open in 2022
title: Uplands station
